channel.title: Player Owned House ~ 20% Done ~ Contributions Accepted
channel.description:
Will be a tutorial after everything is working fine
Things To Do: 1. Get It So You Can Only See People In The Same House As You - [COLOR=Lime]Complete[/COLOR] 2. Getting The Objects To Spawn From A File - [COLOR=Orange]In Progress[/COLOR] 3. Having a way([B]NOT[/B] Command) To Get To People's Houses - [COLOR=Red]Not Started[/COLOR] 4. Finding a 1 & 2 & 3 Story Empty(ish) House - [COLOR=Orange]In Progress[/COLOR]
How I(we) Did It: 1. Used A Loop In The Client As An Advantage 2. NOT DONE 3. NOT DONE 4. Walked Around If you have any suggestions on how to do any of this (thats not [COLOR=Lime]Complete[/COLOR], Post Here.
...Or you can give feedback [b]How i get the objects to spawn from a file:[/b] [i]I'm planning to get them to load from One file.[/i] [b]How To Get Into People's Houses[/b] [i]An object, and then a Enter A Name: chat-interface[/i]
[b]One Story House Coords:[/b] [i]X:2566, Y:3082[/i] [b]Two Story House Coords:[/b] [i]X:2552, Y:3081[/i] [b]Advanced Two Story House Coords:[/b] [i]X:2596, Y:3104[/i]
[b]PLEASE PUT ALL REGUARDING THE POH IN HERE, NOT MY INBOX[/b]
Where To Talk About This(IRC) IRC SERVER: Wholly.swiftirc.net IRC CHANNEL: #ThatOneServer

Things To Do:

  3. Having a way(NOT Command) To Get To People’s Houses - [COLOR=Red]Not Started[/COLOR]

How I(we) Did It:

  2. NOT DONE

  4. Walked Around
    If you have any suggestions on how to do any of this (thats not [COLOR=Lime]Complete[/COLOR], Post Here.

…Or you can give feedback
